fld_Synopsis.value: Set in Guizhou province in 1975, 11 Flowers depicts the last days of the Cultural Revolution as seen through the eyes of an 11-year old boy.
Set in Guizhou province in 1975, 11 Flowers depicts the last days of the Cultural Revolution as seen through the eyes of an 11-year old boy.
本片讲述的是原本无忧无虑的11岁小男孩，在亲眼目睹了一起“杀人事件”后不得不背负上心灵的煎熬，加上朦胧中获知了成人世界里的性事，让他身心开始发生了静悄悄的变化，体内疯长的荷尔蒙和外界的压抑环境不时发生着碰撞和爆发的故事。

fld_Synopsis.value: It is the final section of Arthur. Following the story of the adventure, Arthur will become a real hero.
It is the final section of Arthur. Following the story of the adventure, Arthur will become a real hero.
法国知名导演吕克•贝松自制奇幻冒险动画，《亚瑟和他的迷你王国》动画系列最终章。 随着冒险旅程的展开，亚瑟成为真正的英雄。
Joke is a plain-looking teenager with a self-confidence issue. But Joke is tormented by the secret crush he has on his friend Job, the star of their high school.
Joke is a plain-looking teenager with a self-confidence issue. But Joke is tormented by the secret crush he has on his friend Job, the star of their high school.
少年、青年、老年四对不同年纪的情侣在情人节到来前的2月13日一天时间中，化解误会最终获得真爱与幸福。
Beijing Blues based on a real story, Huiling Zhang is a policeman of Haiding Shuangyushu police station,he had captured 1600 criminal in last seven years.
Beijing Blues based on a real story, Huiling Zhang is a policeman of Haiding Shuangyushu police station,he had captured 1600 criminal in last seven years.
《神探亨特张》根据真人真事改编，张慧领是海淀分局双榆树派出所一名便衣民警，在七年的时间里抓获1600多名违法犯罪嫌疑人。

fld_Actor.value: 塔纳查·图雅查，萨提萨·普罗姆斯利

fld_Synopsis.value: Boonchoke, Boonchu Bangklo’s son is a very optimistic little monk with a good heart. His father wants him to become the abbot but the mother, Moli, defrocks him and sends him to Bangkok.
Boonchoke, Boonchu Bangklo’s son is a very optimistic little monk with a good heart. His father wants him to become the abbot but the mother, Moli, defrocks him and sends him to Bangkok.
Boonchu 是一个非常积极乐观的小和尚，他的父亲希望他能够成为住持，但是他的妈妈却毅然将他送到了曼谷。Boonchu 意外地遇到了两个无家可归的孩子，他们吸毒并给Boonchu 下了药……单纯的Boonchu 如何去面对眼前意想不到的一切，如何在曼谷这个大城市里生存下来呢？……

fld_Actor.value: 凯特·哈德森，安妮·海瑟薇

fld_Synopsis.value: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.
Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.
两位主人公是一对好朋友，因为阴差阳错，两人的婚期都定在了同一天。于是两人开始互相攀比，希望能拥有最最完美的婚礼。
Little orphan Shirley gets in the middle of a nasty custody battle. One of Temple's first and best, most famous for the song, "On the Good Ship Lollipop."
Little orphan Shirley gets in the middle of a nasty custody battle. One of Temple's first and best, most famous for the song, "On the Good Ship Lollipop."
秀兰·邓波儿是一群飞行员的宝贝，她平时轮流跟父亲生前好友飞行员路浦和给一家自私的富人当佣人的妈妈生活。但不幸的事情突然使秀兰成为孤儿，路浦自告奋勇收养秀兰。最后得知其实他并不是唯一想收养这个可爱的小天使的人
Divorced mother , played by Mei Ting the writing wrote obsessions , she entered another mysterious world of ancient witchcraft ......
Divorced mother , played by Mei Ting the writing wrote obsessions , she entered another mysterious world of ancient witchcraft ......
梅婷饰演的离异母亲，写作写到走火入魔，通过古老的巫术，她进入另一个神秘的世界……

Perennially orphaned Shirley washes up from a shipwreck into the arms of a photogenically crusty lighthouse keeper who raises the little castaway with pluck and determination, qualities she'll need when the nasty truant officer tries to separate the two.

Perennially orphaned Shirley washes up from a shipwreck into the arms of a photogenically crusty lighthouse keeper who raises the little castaway with pluck and determination, qualities she'll need when the nasty truant officer tries to separate the two.
自从秀兰·邓波儿在婴孩时被简瑞里船长从船难中救出后，她就一直和简瑞里船长住在一起，她的歌声和舞蹈赢得了大家的喜爱，但他们的幸福生活被打破了，镇上的新官员企图把她夺走扔进慈善机构……

fld_Actor.value: 马丁·兰道，伊丽莎白·泰勒

Historical epic. The triumphs and tragedy of the Egyptian queen, Cleopatra.
这是一部史诗巨制，讲述的是埃及女王克里奥佩特拉的胜利与失败。

fld_Actor.value: 利姆泰兹·阿里，塞加德·阿里

fld_Synopsis.value: A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.
A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.
花花公子Gautam和夜店女王Veronica打得火热，Gautam的母亲一心盼望儿子能和一个传统的印度女孩结婚，不得已之下Gautam只好假称Veronica最好的朋友、温柔贤淑的Meera是他的女朋友，慢慢地，Gautam真心爱上了Meera，而一场车祸改变了三人的命运......

fld_Actor.value: 秀兰·邓波儿，约翰·博尔斯

fld_Synopsis.value: Shirley is the destitute little orphan girl who lives in an orphanage and plays cupid for her beautiful sister. They are discovered by a bachelor millionaire who whisks them off to his Park Avenue abode and promptly falls in love with the older sister.

Shirley is the destitute little orphan girl who lives in an orphanage and plays cupid for her beautiful sister. They are discovered by a bachelor millionaire who whisks them off to his Park Avenue abode and promptly falls in love with the older sister.
小孤女邓波儿不仅是孤儿院里的捣蛋鬼，同时也是大家的开心果。她还有一个姐姐叫伊丽莎白。后来，一位神秘富翁决定收养们，她不仅找出了那人的身份，而且为漂亮姐姐牵起了红线。

fld_Actor.value: 马特奥·加力农，里卡多·库托

fld_Synopsis.value: A couple invites their 4 children for a barbecue back at their farm by the seaside. A Sunday barbecue; endless toasts; a family like any other, yet a family like none other.
A couple invites their 4 children for a barbecue back at their farm by the seaside. A Sunday barbecue; endless toasts; a family like any other, yet a family like none other.
豪尔赫和埃琳娜结婚已经超过35年了，适逢豪尔赫临近退休，他们正计划着做些生活上的改变。为了分享这个消息，他们邀请了他们的4个孩子一起出去烧烤，正当席间情绪正浓，家庭的重要秘密却意外被曝出，被打乱的一切，又会产生多少令人意想不到的“惊喜”呢？

The rise and fall of Napoleon Bonaparte as seen through the eyes of a woman who spurned him when he was impoverished and then fell in love with him as he rose to power but was unrequited in her passion as he married Jospehine.

The rise and fall of Napoleon Bonaparte as seen through the eyes of a woman who spurned him when he was impoverished and then fell in love with him as he rose to power but was unrequited in her passion as he married Jospehine.
讲的是拿破仑发迹之前与一位富商的女儿欧仁妮坠入爱河，但拿破仑发现征服世界更有吸引力，于是拿破仑转而向社会名媛约瑟芬求爱，伤心欲绝的欧仁妮嫁给了伯纳达将军。拿破仑之后终于在1799年登上了法国权力的最高峰，加冕当了皇帝。

The film adopts the mode of two male starring. Good friends, Yu Xia and Jaycee Fang perform hot tasks with hidden identity. JC Stunt Team escort “Lion Prince--Jaycee Fang” sparing no effort.
影片采用双男主模式，夏雨和房祖名两个好朋友各自隐藏身份执行火爆任务，成家班特为“龙太子”助阵，保驾护航。
When Song Qi stumbles upon her boyfriend's affair with her best friend, her life quickly starts falling apart and she is subsequently drawn into a quicksand of revenge and murder.
When Song Qi stumbles upon her boyfriend's affair with her best friend, her life quickly starts falling apart and she is subsequently drawn into a quicksand of revenge and murder.
每个人都有秘密，年轻的宋其也有，她是一家整容公司的形象咨询师，无意发现了男朋友和闺蜜的私情，随之她卷入了一起莫名的谋杀案，但随着案情的深入，一个更大的秘密渐渐逼近了她，在这个秘密里，她的爱情，她的欲望，她的亲情和她那无法治愈的疼痛，都随着她的一次神秘的远行而浮出水面，她要面对和找寻的，是她已经丢失的整个人生.....
The film is a remake of Dragon Gate Inn (1966) and New Dragon Gate Inn (1992). The film received seven nominations at the 2012 Asian Film Awards, including Best Picture and Best Director.
The film is a remake of Dragon Gate Inn (1966) and New Dragon Gate Inn (1992). The film received seven nominations at the 2012 Asian Film Awards, including Best Picture and Best Director.
本片剧情延续自《新龙门客栈》，李连杰饰演的赵怀安和周迅饰演的凌雁秋，将与陈坤饰演的西厂督主雨化田正面相杀。

fld_Actor.value: 马汀·拉普德，彼得·弗莱伯家

fld_Synopsis.value: Jürg can hardly believe it: his wife Fränzi has had enough and leaves him for two weeks. Jürg has no choice but to take charge and manage the farm while also caring for their two children and his forgetful father Karli.

Jürg can hardly believe it: his wife Fränzi has had enough and leaves him for two weeks. Jürg has no choice but to take charge and manage the farm while also caring for their two children and his forgetful father Karli.
Jürg 妻子难以忍受狼狈的生活，决然的离开了，Jürg无从选择，只能承担起管理农场，照顾孩子的义务，于此同时他更要全心的照顾时常健忘的父亲Karli ，但是很快Jürg便意识到自己的父亲并非单纯的年纪变大，而是患上了阿兹海默症……
The story talks about How Renliang Qiao and Xue Lin resist bad guy Zhenyu Wu, a very rich man to protect Old Street culture heritage, and finally become the hero of Old Street.

小人物乔任梁和林雪在与唯利是图的商人吴镇宇的斗争中，保护老街文化遗产不被毁坏，找寻真爱并最终成为了英雄的故事。

A test pilot is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.
哈尔·乔丹原本是一名试飞员，后被飞船在地球坠毁的绿灯侠Abin Sur的戒指召唤成为“绿灯侠”、负责保卫地球和银河地区的治安。在多年的战斗中他立下了赫赫功劳，被称为“史上最伟大的绿灯侠”，同时也是“正义联盟”（JLA）的创立者之一。
The film is about the theft of a large amount of gold from a securely guarded vault.

当正在抢头条新闻记者丹·杰拉尔多穿来到了巴伦比亚时，他毫不怀疑将有不可思议的发现……与当地资深的导游帕比尔多一起，他们将在一场紧张忙乱的历险中经历一对又一个的意外，尤其是揭开了一个惊人的消息：神秘而诙谐的动物马苏比拉米，真的存在！！！

fld_Synopsis.value: Ni (Amber Kuo) comes from a wealthy family. In love with Kai (Peng Yu-yan), her life seems perfect until she finds out her boyfriend had a one night stand with best friend Yi Jia (Chen Yi-han) who is now pregnant.

Ni (Amber Kuo) comes from a wealthy family. In love with Kai (Peng Yu-yan), her life seems perfect until she finds out her boyfriend had a one night stand with best friend Yi Jia (Chen Yi-han) who is now pregnant.
Love讲述了生活在北京和台北4对男女之间的情爱纠葛。它探讨了现代社会纷繁复杂的情爱关系，将呈现摩登台北和时尚北京的不同风貌。
Two ex-lovers from Hong Kong cross paths in Beijing, they realize they still have feelings for each other and start orchestrating trysts and assignations behind their partners’ back.
Two ex-lovers from Hong Kong cross paths in Beijing, they realize they still have feelings for each other and start orchestrating trysts and assignations behind their partners’ back.
影片讲述春娇与志明来到北京生活的故事。男女主角继续是余文乐与杨千嬅，两位主人公遇到一些问题而分开，并且各自找到新的方向。
A psychiatrist meet his father-in-law with his girlfriend, but he figures out father-in-law doesn't like him at all, how could he deal with that?
A psychiatrist meet his father-in-law with his girlfriend, but he figures out father-in-law doesn't like him at all, how could he deal with that?
徐峥饰演的心理医师和女友见岳父，才知岳父大人不仅钱多，且两人互知短处。岳父想赶走准女婿，婚姻还是散伙，一场滑稽大战上演..
Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker have what it takes?
Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker have what it takes?
这次的故事发生在10年后，格雷格·福克在经历了与岳父大人杰克·伯恩斯的一系列"斗法"后，终于获得认可，也过上了幸福的小日子，两个孩子也相继出生成长。为了改善生活，格雷格还在一家药品公司找了一份兼职工作，哪里想到这让他岳父担心自己的孙子是否能受到好的照顾，于是以照看孙子为名，他重新回到了格雷格的生活。

A rookie cop takes on a veteran escape driver in a death defying final showdown on the motorway.
《车手》由杜琪峰监制，郑保瑞执导，余文乐、黄秋生、大S、郭晓冬、李光洁、林家栋等主演，讲述一个警匪斗车的故事。
Rigid insurance worker Dong-Sik (Song Sae-Byeok) learns the skill of flattery from the master of flattery Heo Go-Soo (Sung Dong-Il). He then sets out to become the king of insurance salesmen. ....
Rigid insurance worker Dong-Sik (Song Sae-Byeok) learns the skill of flattery from the master of flattery Heo Go-Soo (Sung Dong-Il). He then sets out to become the king of insurance salesmen. ....
保险公司职员东植老实巴交，非常不擅于处理人际关系，但因为父亲欠了一屁股债不得不需找立即致富的良方，以解燃眉之急。东植不得已去向能点石成金的拍马屁达人——舌如簧拜师学艺。尽管东植在情商方面比较欠缺，但“舌如簧”仍力求将蕴藏在他身上的谄媚天赋激发出来。在一系列的训练之后，东植摇身一变，成了保险公司业务骨干，事业生活都发生了翻天覆地的变化.

fld_Actor.value: 尼娅·瓦达拉斯，约翰·考伯特

fld_Synopsis.value: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
Toula（妮娅·瓦达拉斯 Nia Vardalos 饰）虽然在美国出生长大，却是生活在一个巨型的希腊世界中，整个庞大的家族以父亲权威般的意志为代表坚持着希腊是世界之源的精神动力，从小就眼观着家人古怪行为的Toula听得最多的就是母亲与神经质祖母的言论：嫁给一个希腊人，生一大堆希腊小孩，喂饱自己的肚子直到世界的最后一天。

一个药剂师女孩是疯狂的伍迪·艾伦粉丝，她的爱情生活因此出了问题。伍迪·艾伦将在这部电影中客串。

阿B原是叱咤赛道的冠军车手，因一场意外失去名与利，最爱的妻子也离他而去，此后一直用酒精与赌博来麻醉自己。一天妻子归来，托付阿B照顾他素未谋面的儿子彬彬，他被爱儿所感染，激起重投赛事的雄心壮志！

Set in the near future, an ex-jewel thief receives a gift from his son: a robot butler programmed to look after him. But soon the two companions try their luck as a heist team.
影片发生在不久的将来，一位老人的儿子为他提供了一个机器人来照料他的日常生活，老人和机器人之间由此产生了很多故事。

A New York attorney is sent to Shanghai on business, where he finds himself in a legal mess that threatens his career. With the help of a relocation specialist and her contacts, he soon learns to appreciate the wonders of Shanghai.
雄心勃勃的纽约律师山姆被派到上海工作，意外地陷入了法律泥潭，使他差点丢了工作。但随着一位聪明性感的助理，一个机灵的上海记者，一位漂亮的迁居专家，以及一个人脉广泛的老前辈（比尔.帕克斯顿）的帮助，山姆有机会保住工作。在上海生活的这段时间，他竟然慢慢第寻找到足以支撑他一生的爱情。…

影片翻拍自1976年经典电影《火花》，是一部讲述黑人歌手奋斗历程的音乐电影，它既是惠特尼的遗作，也是她生前最大的心愿。

fld_Actor.value: 瑞安·古兹曼，凯瑟琳·麦考米克

Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.
影片融合了不同的舞蹈风格及服饰，看上去更加性感。而那些现实故事，也令它不再是一个架空的舞蹈世界，而是一个真实的世界。

fld_Actor.value: 珍妮·盖诺,乔治·奥布莱恩

fld_Synopsis.value: A young farmer is tempted by the charms of a sophisticated city woman, who suggests to him that his dull wife might accidentally drown. He considers this plan, and imagines what his life might be like if he went to the big bad city.

A young farmer is tempted by the charms of a sophisticated city woman, who suggests to him that his dull wife might accidentally drown. He considers this plan, and imagines what his life might be like if he went to the big bad city.
盛夏的度假时节，一位城市女人来到乡下滞留，这期间，城市女人诱惑了当地的农夫并教唆他杀死自己的妻子以便贩卖掉农庄后私奔。被迷惑了心窍的男人早已忘记了那些同妻子共处的纯美时光，他将妻子带到河面蓄谋加害，却在要下毒手时幡然悔悟，伤心的妻子踏上了进城的列车，男人穷追不舍一同抵达城市。城市里真正是一片花花世界呵，这对夫妻在街上游走玩乐，在那些小小的玩笑中，甜蜜的冒险中，他们又找回了爱情的美妙共鸣……

fld_Actor.value: 杰克·莱蒙，雪莉·麦克雷恩

fld_Synopsis.value: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
剧情描述在大公司内当小职员的杰克·莱蒙为了想出人头地，不惜把自己居住的单身公寓出借给上司作为他跟情人幽会的场所，直至他发现这个与上司幽会的女孩子竟然是他爱上的电梯女郎之后，才重新思考到自己的人生尊严。

导演哈瑞为了新片来到西班牙马德里一家夜总会，他说服了在夜总会跳舞的玛丽亚，他们合作了三部电影取得了空前成功，玛利亚成了好莱坞的大明星。成名后的玛利亚并未沾染明星的恶习，她没有绯闻，私生活从不公开。

一位前任海军舰长来到西部与一个牧场主的女儿结了婚。不久他便被卷入一场世仇争斗中。富有的牧场主和年高德勋的族长为了牧场的水源而发生争斗。尽管很难分辨谁是谁非，但在男主人公的努力下，问题最后还是得到了解决，争斗终于平息了下去。
A bishop trying to get a new cathedral built prays for guidance. An angel (Cary Grant) arrives, but his guidance isn't about fundraising.

主教大人为了替一个新城市的大教堂募集资金，曾祈求上帝的帮助。善良的天使应主教的请求于圣诞节降临人间，帮助疲备不堪的主教大人，却不可自拔地爱上了主教的妻子。这段人神纠结的恋情该何去何从？

《纳尼亚传奇3》讲述了露茜、埃德蒙以及新加入的角色——他们那令人讨厌的表弟尤斯塔斯被吞噬进一幅画里，开始了前往世界尽头的纳尼亚航海之旅，他们与老朋友凯宾斯王子以及老鼠勇士佩契普再次联合，护送一个秘密的任务。途中他们到达了很多奇异的岛屿，经历了常人难以想象的冒险。

李维斯在片中扮演的是外星智慧生命克拉图，他和一个威力无比的重型装甲机器人一起来到地球，警告地球领导人如果他们继续发展进攻性武器，地球将会被宇宙中爱好和平的外星观察者消灭。为了传达这个信息，克拉图历尽艰难，想办法逐渐了解地球，最终采取了一种出乎意料的办法让地球人警醒。

影片讲述了“五位死党”乔治、朱利安、迪克、安妮和小狗提米之间的故事。他们意外发了一个个大阴谋，一座秘密的实验室建在小岛上，计划研制一种具有毁灭力量的新能源，而为了达到这个目的，他们绑架了乔治的父亲，一位著名的科学家。但不论是警察还是乔治的母亲，都不相信孩子们的话，他们不得不单独行动。

这部电影讲述了一群朋友决心要尝试不做任何工作去生活的冒险故事，他们在自家平台上立起了广告牌，企图以此招租广告获得收益，并开始试图寻找商家出资。然而五年过后，他们并没有获得任何广告需求，理想的乌托邦驱使他们来到了马德普拉塔国际电影节，去寻找一位曾凭借电影一鸣惊人的制片人来投资他们的项目……

《雨中的树》根据原中共四川省万源市委常委、组织部长李林森的真实故事改编，讲述了李林森平凡而又卓越的人生轨迹。《雨中的树》并不想刻画一个高大全的模范人物，反而是从角色最朴实的生活细节入手，首先展现给观众的是一位活生生、接地气的普通人，其次才是一位一心为民的好官。
Sean betrays his team of police officers in order to get the virus so he can mutate it into a biological weapon, develop a vaccine and sell it to a corrupt pharmaceutical company.
Sean betrays his team of police officers in order to get the virus so he can mutate it into a biological weapon, develop a vaccine and sell it to a corrupt pharmaceutical company.
周杰伦和谢霆锋饰演一对自幼失散的兄弟，当多年后弟弟找到哥哥时，却发现两人竟是一警一匪，立场对立，兄弟间将上演火爆对战。
Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.
Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.
一群闲极无聊的美国爷们组成邻里联防队，在小区里巡逻。却意外发现身边已被伪装成居民的外星人占领，他们必须站出来保护家园。

fld_Actor.value: 德鲁·巴里摩尔，亚当·桑德勒

fld_Synopsis.value: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.
Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.
一心一意梦想着当上创新歌手的罗比，最后只落得在小镇上担任婚礼歌手的二流角色，可怜的罗比灰心丧志之余，同事兼好友的餐厅女服务生茱莉，不忍见到罗比颓废的模样，硬是拉他来为自己两周後的婚礼张罗准备，毕竟罗比是准备婚礼的歌手。

fld_Actor.value: 科林·法瑞尔，凯特·贝金赛尔

fld_Synopsis.value: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
新版《全面回忆》将不同于阿诺的老版，更加现实主义和充满隐喻，用宏大的场景描绘了一个东西方文明割据、政府与叛军势力对抗的未来世界。

fld_Actor.value: 希安·拉博夫，梅根·福克斯

fld_Synopsis.value: An ancient struggle reerupts on Earth between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager.
An ancient struggle reerupts on Earth between two extraterrestrial clans, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a young teenager.
霸天虎”的先遣部队旋风和毒蝎袭击了美军位于卡塔尔的军事基地，与此同时，路障帮助他的搭档迷乱潜入了美国总统的座机空中一号，通过电脑获悉，要想找到威震天就必须找到维特维奇家族的那副眼镜，上面有威震天关于能量块的信息扫描，而它现在的拥有者萨姆•维特维奇成为了“霸天虎”攻击的目标。

fld_Actor.value: 杰夫·布里吉斯，加内特·德赫兰

fld_Synopsis.value: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's creation turned bad and a unique ally who was born inside the digital domain of The Grid.

The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's creation turned bad and a unique ally who was born inside the digital domain of The Grid.
故事主人公是27岁的萨姆，他是第一部里男主角凯文·弗林的儿子，由加内特·赫德兰扮演。萨姆·弗林为了寻找失踪多年的父亲，和女友一起也进入了格斗游戏中，然后见到了在这个“电子世界”生活了25年的父亲，之后3人共同展开一段生死大冒险。
Telling a story about how a woman's love, family, and the land she stands being changed in history.
Telling a story about how a woman's love, family, and the land she stands being changed in history.
影片以黑娃、小娥的爱情故事为引子讲述白鹿原上的故事，从小人物的卑微爱情，到轰轰烈烈的家族情仇，再到翻天覆地的历史剧变。

淘气女孩“王雨果”意外跌落山崖，掉落到属于动物们的世外桃源，与纯真的动物们一起经历奇幻冒险…
